content: That's really helpful. I'm glad I have my retired teacher classmate as a mentor, and I'll definitely consider seeking out mentors from different stages of their careers or lives. Speaking of career development, I've been thinking about taking some online courses or attending seminars to upskill and reskill. My 29-year-old friend, Alex, has been doing this with great success. Do you think it's a good idea to invest in continuous learning and professional development, even if it means spending some money?
